GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
drm/panfrost: Fix GEM handle creation ref-counting

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 0b70f6ea4d4f2b4d4b291d86ab76b4d07394932c, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit f3ba91228e8e917e5bd6c4b72bfe846933d17370. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/panfrost: Fix GEM handle creation ref-counting
